Text: The Irish Red and White Setter () is a breed of dog, more specifically a setter.

2:
--------------------
Text: Irish Red and White Setter:  It is virtually identical in use and temperament to the related Irish Setter and its other setter cousins, the Gordon and English setters, but is more often found as a working gun dog.
Triplets:<Irish Red and White Setter
